snippet: The JOBS Act is intended to help start-ups raise capital and go public, but may also lead to many more money-losing Groupon-like I.P.O.'s.
abstract: The JOBS Act is intended to help start-ups raise capital and go public, but may also lead to many more money-losing Groupon-like I.P.O.'s.

headline.main: JOBS Act Jeopardizes Safety Net for Investors
headline.print_headline: JOBS Act Jeopardizes Safety Net For Investors
